description: Main entry point and root widget for the Flutter application 'Black & Gold Dining'. It initializes state providers for menu, cart, and orders, applies the app theme, and sets up the initial home screen.

classes.name: RestaurantApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Black & Gold Dining Flutter app; sets up state management and theming.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the RestaurantApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, initializing providers and setting up the MaterialApp.
